name: Tag: You're It!
description:
In this top-down competitive game, you play the classic playground game of "Tag: You're It!" with up to four friends or computers (or a fun mixture of both!) The player who is It for the least amount of time is the winner!

Collect items to wield against your opponents, and give yourself the upper hand. With the Speed power-up, you can outrun your opponents and gain a fast-paced edge. With the Warp power-up, you immediately switch places with a random player! You can use it to escape and confuse, or infiltrate and take-down!

Navigate through three thrilling stages, each with their own highly developed form of play.

  • In Electric, battle in a tight and fast-paced electricity themed arena!
  • In Beach, play a game of bait and switch as you navigate the winding docks
  • In Forest, race through the mysterious maze of trees to escape getting caught

This is currently the beta version of "Tag: You're It!" More versions will be added in the future with more stages, items, and game modes!

UPDATES

Version 1.1

  • Added Playground Stage
  • Added a stage preview on main menu
  • All new It Indicator and Speed Indicator sprites
  • Menu colors look a lot nicer
Version 1.0
  • Initial Release
